Class HawqOutputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,Object>

  • public class HawqOutputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,Object>
    A HAWQ output format that uses a JDBC connection.
